lead_paragraph: The tale of a contemporary Scheherazade figure unfolds in present day Portugal with its economic crisis and social ebullition. It is 2013-14 and Portugal is inhabited by rich and poor, powerful and insignificant people, workers and unemployed as well as thieves and honest men. It is also a delirious and excessive Portugal marked by the consequences of the crisis. Will Ali Baba be able to escape the cave before the 40 thieves arrive? Will Portugal be able to avoid a second aid package and return to the markets? Based on "Arabian Nights", a collection of West and South Asian stories and folk tales compiled in Arabic during the Islamic Golden Age.
